MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA16 postcode area of Greenock, affecting properties in Angus Road. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1:15pm due to a fault on our underground cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:51pm on Friday, 19 February 2021
